t: How to use Amazon Lens for faster online shopping
s: November 20, 2024 - Another way to use Amazon Lens is via Camera Search feature. This lets users click a photo of an item they are interested in and find it on Amazon. They can also refine their search results by adding text after clicking a picture, like specifying a brand or changing the color of the product.

t: How to use the Lens Feature on Amazon?
s: September 11, 2024 - Even though it doesn’t always succeed, it does its best to find a product on Amazon that looks similar to the image. For this instance, I used the Amazon lens to scan my daughter’s brand new basketball shoes, and it found a matching dog suit with the same colors.
